coreAttributes.name: tie
coreAttributes.description: A smart-looking tie. Although designed to be worn with a shirt, it could be worn with any outfit as a fashion statement.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.name], before fastening the tie around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc.her] tie, before taking it off from around [npc.her] neck.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] tie, before taking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] tie, before yanking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
